content.body: Thanks. With the syntax sketch I boiled down https://gist.github.com/rbuckton/e1e8947da16f936edec1d269f00e2c53 to the things we actually need. In essence, it uses the same syntax as `class`, except with the keywords `struct` or `shared struct` to indicate how both definition evaluation and instantiation will fundamentally differ from regular classes.
